title: Niftify.io

comments.author: saxydev
comments.body: Short answer: No. NFT's are scams as they are used these days.

comments.author: itallcanwait
comments.body: I'm afraid I have to disagree with that. NFT is not scum, especially nowadays. As for me it is a great idea to earn money by playing, for example
